ValidationRule.description: This rule will validate the product effective year and the year of adimition.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Hospitalization", NOT(Text(year ( Date_of_Admission__c )) = Service_Provided_by_Facility__r.Effective_year__c), NOT( ISBLANK( Date_of_Admission__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Product effective year does not match with Year of Admission.
